replies.body: [A source since you're one of those people who post things without sourcing.](http://www.myextralife.com/comic/a-hard-place/)
did you link source? no. so you are one of those people who dont post source.

ps, the image is a clickable link which takes you to an obvious cheezburger URL. The comic itself has the author of the comic, his website, and the name of the strip.

Thanks for stopping by.
you didnt credit the author. simple as that. poor sourcing or no sourcing at all. that is what prime was referring to.
The souce is in the comic Strip itself. I'm not entirely sure what you are asking for.
the point is YOU didnt credit them. the comic did...
